0000000_00001_00001_000_00001_0010011 //R1 + 1 -> R1
1111111_01110_00000_111_00000_0000000 //NOP
0000000_00001_00000_000_00100_1100011 //beq R0, R1
0000111_11111_00011_000_00011_0010011 //R3 + 15 -> R3
0000000_00100_00100_000_00100_0010011 //R4 + 4 -> R4
0000000_00001_00001_000_00010_0110011 //R1 + R1 -> R2
0100000_00001_00001_000_00010_0110011 //R1 - R1 -> R2
0000000_00100_00000_010_00000_0100011 //sw R4,$0
0000000_00011_00000_000_00100_0100011 //sb R3,$4
0000000_00001_00001_000_00001_0010011 //R1 + 1 -> R1
0000000_00000_00000_010_00101_0000011 //lw $0,R5
0000000_00100_00000_000_00110_0000011 //lb $4,R6
0000000_00100_00000_100_00111_0000011 //lbu $4,R7
xxxxxxx_xxxxx_xxxxx_xxx_xxxxx_xxxxxxx
